definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials

sentences.english: What the blueprint is to the builder the outline is to the writer.
sentences.chinese: 寫作提綱之於作家，就如同藍圖之於建築師一樣。

sentences.english: He rough-hewed the resolution of the meeting and sent it to the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 他草草寫出大會決議的提綱，然後把它交給主席。

sentences.english: You can give me an outline how to solve.
sentences.chinese: 你可以給我一個解答提綱。

sentences.english: If we do not agree on the outline, any text is useless.
sentences.chinese: 在我們就提綱告竣一致以前，寫正文是沒有意義的。

sentences.english: After reading , let's make a writing outline for it.
sentences.chinese: 讀完後，咱們一起來分析寫作提綱。

sentences.english: If I didn’t write outlines, I’d never finish anything.
sentences.chinese: 我要是不列提綱，那我一篇文章也寫不完。

sentences.english: According to the outline, write your own articles.
sentences.chinese: 請根據寫作提綱，寫一篇作文。

sentences.english: Mr. Xin Shuzhi's original manuscript of an outline of the Chinese and foreign science laws has been found recently.
sentences.chinese: 辛樹幟先生論中外科學大律提綱手跡新近發現。

sentences.english: It may be briefly summarized in the following outline.
sentences.chinese: 這可以用下面的提綱簡短地加以概括。

sentences.english: If the things get organized, perhaps through an outline.
sentences.chinese: 如果條理化，也許會產生一份提綱。

sentences.english: The best way to get started on your thesis is to prepare an extended outline.
sentences.chinese: 開始寫論文的最好方法是準備一個大範圍的提綱。

sentences.english: By default, the outline is dynamically synchronized with editing.
sentences.chinese: 缺省情況下，提綱與編輯動態同步。

sentences.english: Any plans you write are not taken into account when an assessment is made of your work.
sentences.chinese: 作文評分時不會考慮考生的寫作提綱。

sentences.english: Make an outline before you start writing.
China Mobile— China Mobile Oct. 2008 . Content . Key Functions of the System.
sentences.chinese: 中國移動企業郵箱用戶平臺2008版幫助手冊提綱。

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
dealing with red tape/paperwork/(Tw) word processing
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
